summary.body: I hate to be a moaning minnie, but the sound of the lady above me marching up and down and up and down her flat is driving me mad! Whats the etiquette here? She must have a wooded/hard floor. I guess I might just need to knock on her door and have a quiet word, but by the sound of her footsteps, she sounds bigger than me!
summary.subject: Footsteps driving me crazy!

summary.body: Anyone know where I can get plastic sheeting large enough to wrap a king sized mattress in?
summary.subject: plastic sheeting

summary.body: Has anybody tried to wall mount a plasma screen and channel out for the wiring, and if so how successful was it?
summary.subject: Plasma Screens

summary.body: Does anyone know how the wires for the new TV system are going to be run? When the last block of flats I lived in got cabled, they just drilled holes through the floors and ran white plastic cable guides everywhere, and I guess I'm concerned this doesn't happen here.
summary.subject: New TV system

summary.body: has anyone tried sinking cabling into our concrete walls? any suggestions on the best way to do this?
summary.subject: sinking cabling
